caseTitle: Barrister Zafar Ullah Khan v. Federation of Pakistan etc
authorJudge: MR. JUSTICE MIAN SAQIB NISAR, HCJ
tagline: The Court directs the Federal and Provincial Governments, the Water and Power Development Authority (WAPDA) and all the executive authorities in the country who are responsible or have nexus/connection with the building of the Diamer Bhasha and Mohmand Dams and all matters connected thereto, to take all necessary steps for the commencement of construction and early completion of said dams. An account shall be established for the time being in the name of the Registrar of the Supreme Court for collecting funds donated by the people of the country for the construction and establishment of the dams.
